Setup.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

Data.

```{r}
dataset <- tibble::tribble(
  ~site,  ~sp, ~status,
    "a", "sp1",    "A",
    "a", "sp1",    "D",
    "a", "sp1",    "A",
    "b", "sp1",    "A",
    "b", "sp2",    "D",
    "b", "sp3",    "A"
)
dataset
```

Create an interaction variable to "dodge manually".

```{r}
dodge <- mutate(dataset, site_sp = interaction(site, sp))
dodge
```

Count.

```{r}
dodge <- add_count(dodge, site_sp)
```

Plot.

```R
ggplot(dodge, aes(x = site_sp, y = n, fill = status)) +
  geom_col()
```
